name: monetr
description: Monetr is a self-hosted personal finance management platform that connects to banks to display transaction details, budget categories, and insights. It offers API access and real-time sync with Plaid.
features: Bank integration: Connect to financial institutions via Plaid for automatic transaction imports and real-time balance updates.
Budget tracking: Create spending categories with monthly limits and track progress against goals with visual indicators.
Expense categorization: Automatically classify transactions by type and manually adjust categories for accurate reporting.
Recurring transactions: Identify and manage subscription payments, bills, and regular income with automated detection.
Financial insights: View spending trends, category breakdowns, and monthly comparisons through interactive charts.
Goal planning: Set savings targets and track progress with projected completion dates based on current habits.
Multi-account support: Manage checking, savings, and credit accounts in a unified dashboard with consolidated views.
API access: Integrate with external tools or build custom workflows using REST endpoints for programmatic data access.
